name: Richard A. SMITH, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Smith v. Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas

parties: Richard A. SMITH, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of November, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are GRANTED. The court of common pleas is DIRECTED to adjudicate Petitioner’s pending filing within 90 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
104 A.3d 1156
Richard A. SMITH, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Respondent.
No. 158 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 21, 2014.
